# BoolBnB - Team6

My team and I developed a responsive single-page app with the aim of managing and finding apartment rentals. We created both a user-facing SPA and a dashboard for apartment owners, prioritizing graphic results and effective functionalities. Specifically, we focused on messaging functionality and filtered search.

## Authors

-  [@tobiarigon](https://github.com/TobiaRigon)
-  [@filippocafaro](https://github.com/FilippoDibe)
-  [@domenicoforlano](https://github.com/Dome1992)
-  [@gabrieledirocco](https://github.com/Gdr0)
-  [@giacomoagave](https://github.com/Jack-170)
